thread.section_title: PureFormulas Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of PureFormulas | www.pureformulas.com
thread.title: D Pendzick

author: D Pendzick
title: D Pendzick
text: I decided to make gift baskets for my sisters of all my favorite beauty products and supplements. I researched the most popular stores online to compare prices. I came across Pure Formulas and they had everything I was looking for in one place and the prices were the cheapest out of all the stores I researched. I was also happy they offered promo codes directly on their site to make the savings even better. Shipping was fast. I will remain a loyal customer and they will be my go-to online store for all my beauty products, vitamins, supplements and possibly more.. thanks so much!!
